template.name: OutSensor
template.parameter: const int[0, N_OUT_SENSORS-1] id, const int[0, N_SLOTS-1] position, const int probWeight_1, const int probWeight_2

template.name: ConveyorBelt
InSensor
template.parameter: const int[0, N_IN_SENSORS-1] id, const int [0, N_STATIONS-1] station_controlled, const int probWeight_1, const int probWeight_2

template.name: Initializer
template.parameter: const int frequency, const int[0, N_SLOTS-1] headPos, const int[0, N_SLOTS-1] tailPos, const int nDisks

template.name: Station
template.parameter: const int[0, N_STATIONS-1] station_id, const int[0, N_SLOTS-1] slot_id, const int elaboration_time, const int[0, N_SLOTS-1] in_sensor_slot, const int[0, N_OUT_SENSORS-1] out_sensor_id, const double stdDeviation

query.comment:
No spawn or disappear of disk
Verifies properties: P1. it never happens that a station holds more than 1 piece; P2. it never happens that two pieces occupy the same belt slot.

plot.title: Probability Density Distribution
plot.comment: Parameters: α=0.05, ε=0.05, bucket width=2.2204e-16, bucket count=1 Runs: 72 in total, 72 (100%) displayed, 0 (0%) remaining Span of displayed sample: [0, 0] Mean estimate of displayed sample: ≈ 0

query.comment:
If a station is processing, no other piece is waiting to enter immediately before
Verifies property: P1. It never happens that a station holds more than 1 piece.

query.formula: Pr[<=300] (<> (forall(id:int[0, N_OUT_SENSORS - 1]) outSensor(id).Locked imply check_queue(id, POS_OUT_SENSORS[id])))
query.comment:
If the sensor is locked, at least one position between it's input sensor and the location right before it is free
Verifies property: P3. No queue ever exceeds the maximum allowed length.
